Title: BATTLERUN
StartInstructions: Play through an epic battle using your voice to control the outcome, and make the final choice between light and dark.
DemoInstructions: Click the play button to begin.
DemoInstructionUnlocked: You have unlocked a new LEGO Set!
DemoInstructionTapX: Tap the X button to continue the story.
Vignette1MotionInstruction1: Draw a CIRCLE To Help BB-8
Vignette2VoiceInstruction1: Say BZZZZZZZZ! To Use Rey's Lightsaber!
Vignette2VoiceInstruction2: Say PEW PEW! To Use Blasters!
Vignette2MotionInstruction1: Draw a Z to use Rey's Lightsaber!
Vignette2MotionInstruction2: Draw a TRIANGLE to Use Blasters!
Vignette3VoiceInstruction1: Say SHOOT SHOOT! To Use The Cannon!
Vignette3VoiceInstruction2: Say ZOOOOOOOM! To Chase In The Speeder!
Vignette3MotionInstruction1: Draw a Z To Use The Cannon!
Vignette3MotionInstruction2: Draw a CIRCLE To Chase In The Speeder!
Vignette4VoiceInstruction2: Say GO GO! To Have BB-8 Flee!
Vignette4MotionInstruction1: Draw a TRIANGLE To Follow Poe!
Vignette4MotionInstruction2: Draw a Z To Have BB-8 Flee!
Vignette5VoiceInstruction1: Say RRRRRRRR! To Use The Force!
Vignette5MotionInstruction1: Draw a CIRCLE To Use The Force!
Vignette6MotionInstruction1: Draw a TRIANGLE To Help BB-8 Escape!
Vignette7VoiceInstruction1: Say BZZZZZZZ! To Hack The TIE Fighter!
Vignette7MotionInstruction1: Draw a Z To Hack The TIE Fighter!
Vignette8VoiceInstruction1: Say BZZZZZT! For BB-9E To Win!
Vignette8VoiceInstruction2: Say WHACK WHACK! For BB-8 To Win!
Vignette8MotionInstruction1: Draw a Z For BB-9E To Win!
Vignette8MotionInstruction2: Draw a TRIANGLE For BB-8 To Win!
